title: Strings
text: A string is a sequence of characters.
objective: learn to combine and manipulate strings

section.title: Length
section.text: The len function returns the length of a string.

section.title: Indexes
section.text: Each character in a string is referred to by an index.

section.title: Index Range
section.text: A subsequence of characters in a string can be referred to by specifying a starting and ending index.

section.title: Immutability
section.text: Strings cannot be modified after they are created.

section.title: Pig Latin
section.text: Translate words from English into Pig Latin.

section.title: String Functions
section.text: Strings are virtual objects that can perform certain functions on their contents.

section.title: String Exercises
section.text: A series of practice problems involving strings.

section.title: DNA Exercises
section.text: A series of practice problems to introduce Python's application to bioinformatics.
